One of the most readable and fascinating books on this subject is Killing Our Own* by Harvey Wasserman and Norman Solomon.

This book tells about the countless human deaths already caused by the Hiroshima and Nagasaki bombs, the Nevada bomb tests, the tests in the Pacific Islands, uranium mining, exposure in nuclear industries, and the near meltdown at the Three-Mile Island nuclear power plant.

*Killing Our Own may be obtained from bookstores or from Dell Publishing Company, Inc., One Dag Hammarskjold Plaza, New York, New York 10017 (Copyright, 1982).
